title: Enhancing Advanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: College-level math fundamentals and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Requires designing qualitative research-based collaborative activities in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments. Emphasizes peer assessment and feedback mechanisms.

learning_goals: Learners can perform fair role distribution in the collaborative process with peer learners using an online discussion platform.
Learners can establish learning strategies reflecting their identity while solving complex mathematical problems based on peer feedback.
Learners can recognize and adjust participation gaps to achieve an 80% or higher completion rate for group projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
